cab.content: THIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY'S GOVERNMENTPrinted for the War Cabinet. December 1943.SECRET.W.M. (53)174th Conclusions.Copy No.WAR CABINET 174 (43),CONCLUSIONS of a Meeting of the War Cabinet held at 10, Downing Street,S.W.1, on Wednesday, 22nd December, 1943, at 12 15 p.m.Present :The Right Hon. C. R. Attlee, M.P., Deputy Prime Minister (in the Chair).The Right Hon. Sir John Anderson,M.P., Chancellor of the Exchequer.The Right Hon. Oliver Lyttelton,M.P., Minister of Production.the right hon.The Right Hon. Ernest Bevin, M.P.Minister of Labour and NationalService.The Right Hon. Herbert Morrison,M.P., Secretary of State for theHome Department and Minister ofHome SecurityLord Woolton.Minister of Reconstruction.The following was also present :General Sir Alan Brooke, Chief of theImperial General Staff.Secretariat.Sir Edward Bridges.Brigadier E. I. C. Jacob.Conferences at The Chief of the Imperial General Staff gave the War CabinetCairo and an account of the main military matters deait with at theseTeheran. Conferences, and of the impressions which he had derived during(Previous his tour of the Italian front.Reference: . A record of the discussion is contained in the Secretary'sW.M. (43) 170th Standard File of War Cabinet Conclusions.Conclusions,Minute 1.)Offices of the War Cabinet, S.W. 1,22nd December, 1943.[26626-3]
